Name: Daaang!
About the game: Daaang! is a hyper-casual physics-based sandbox platformer. Roll around at your leisure with no time limits or hard objectives, the perfect game for the end of a hard day. Play your own way and on your own terms. Explore large scale surreal and fantastical levels Earn money by smashing your way through anything you see For every object hit in the air your payout multiplier increases so be sure to plan the best routes for big payouts Control is lost when you've reached the peak of your height, so momentum must be managed carefully Use up to four different special moves each with their own upgrades to help you maximize control Use that money to purchase upgrades: Increase the number of jumps you can perform Increase the force of each jump Increase the rotational torque to help climb steeper obstacles Increase the sheer movement force for even bigger air Purchase and upgrade six different ball types each with their own physics characteristics Features: Smash your way through destructible glass, launch off bumpers, pop happy faced balloons, fly off corkscrews and loops, high five cat paw statues, and take out UFOs and more! 5 unlockable ball types, 6 total (Steel, Wood, Tennis, Rock, Glass, Meat) each with their own physics characteristics 3 unlockable special moves for each ball type, 4 total available (Launch, Slam, Brake, Super Jump) 4 movement stats for each ball type with 5-20 levels of upgrades each (Jump count, Jump force, Roll Torque, Movement Force) Unlockable ball skins and unlockable in-game cheats (coming soon) Massive ~1-4 km^2 fantastical and surreal levels (more always coming!) No in-app purchases, everything offline unlockable by playing the game
